LC_E.V.I.L_P2 acceptPlayerMessage: We wish to test you. Your first assignment is on the table. Take it and go.
LC_E.V.I.L_P2 completePlayerMessage: Your next assignment will be to you shortly
LC_E.V.I.L_P2 Task1: Kill 15 targets from 25 meters or less using the 9x19mm Beretta Raffica in one raid
LC_E.V.I.L_P2 description: Artem has sent for you again. It can't be that bad right?
LC_E.V.I.L_P2 note: A challenge for those who dare.
